metadata.Title: CVE-2015-3879 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Media Player Framework in Android before 5.1.1 LMY48T allows attackers to gain privileges via a crafted application, aka internal bug 23223325.

notes.Note: sbeattie> second fix is in the latest binary drivers for Nexus devices "libmedia OOB write anywhere. Clarify that decrypt destination is not a pointer for secure case."

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
